clipboard.unavailable: Clipboard access is not available in this browser.

connect.title: Connect service
connect.selfAddBlocked: It is not possible to add my user to the contact list.

contact.title: Contact service
contact.profileRequestDeclined: The contact declined the profile information request.

connect.title: Add a connection
connect.description: The connect ID I want to import.
connect.label: Connect ID
connect.policy: Contact ID, user ID, contact user ID, and the subscribed flag are saved on our server. This information is essential for the app to work.

delete.title: Delete contact
delete.confirm: This contact and all related data will be permanently deleted. Are you sure?

profile.title: Contact profile
profile.policy: The contact profile ID and subscription are stored on the server. Name and avatar remain local.
profile.imageInvalid: Please select a valid image file.
profile.imageTooLarge: The image is too large. Maximum allowed size is {{ maxMb }} MB.

message.policy: This information is stored on our server and is visible to everyone.

moderation.title: Moderation service
moderation.message: Moderating message using OpenAI moderation AI

backup.title: Backup
backup.signInRequired: Please sign in before creating a backup.
backup.folderSelectionUnsupported: Folder selection is not supported. Save the backup file instead.
backup.notSupported: Backup is not supported in this browser.
backup.collectingServerData: Collecting your data from the server

restore.title: Restore
restore.versionUnsupported: This backup version is not supported.
restore.completed: Restore completed. Please log in with your PIN.
restore.invalidFile: This file is not a valid backup.
restore.readFailed: Backup file could not be read.
restore.encryptedNotSupported: Encrypted backups are not supported in this browser.
restore.pinIncorrect: PIN is incorrect or the backup is corrupted.
restore.overwriteMessage: Restoring this backup will delete the current user and all related data on this device and on the server. Continue?
restore.overwriteUserHint: The backup belongs to user {{ userId }}.
restore.deleteUserFailed: Unable to delete the current user.
restore.imageRestoreUnsupported: Image restore is not supported in this browser.

serverDown.title: Oops! Our server went on a coffee break...
serverDown.message:
Apparently, our backend needed some "me time".

Don't worry, we sent a carrier pigeon to bring it back.

backupExit.title: Create backup before leaving?
backupExit.message: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to create a backup now?

location.locatingMessage: Please wait while your device determines your current location...
location.failed: Position could not be determined. Please try again later.
location.searchingNear: Searching for "{{ term }}" near your location

notifications.systemBody: You have a new system message.

files.pickerUnsupported: File picker is not supported in this browser.

user.deleteSuccess: User and related data were removed permanently.

language.title: Language
language.description: Choose how MessageDrop picks your language.

storage.title: Persistent storage
storage.description: Keeps local data safe from automatic cleanup.
storage.note: When available, we ask the browser to keep IndexedDB data permanently. Ideal for offline usage or large message archives.
storage.warning: Persistent storage could not be granted by the browser.
storage.confirmDisable: Disabling may allow the browser to prune stored data. Do you really want to continue?

backup.title: Backup reminder
backup.description: Ask before closing if new data should be backed up.
backup.note: When enabled, you will be prompted before leaving the app if there are new changes.

errors.unknown: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
errors.noteTooLarge: Note is too large. Maximum {{ maxChars }} characters.
errors.unauthorized: You need to sign in to continue.
errors.rateLimit: Too many requests. Please wait and try again.

offline.title: Oops! You are offline..
offline.message: Apparently, your network needed some "me time".

message.badRequest: The request could not be processed.
message.unauthorized: You need to sign in to continue.
message.forbidden: You are not allowed to access this resource.
message.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
message.requestTimeout: The request took too long to complete.
message.tooManyRequests: You sent too many requests. Please wait a moment.
message.badGateway: The server received an invalid response.
message.gatewayTimeout: The server took too long to respond.
message.unexpected: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

systemMessages.requestFailed: Unable to process request for system messages.
systemMessages.unexpected: Unexpected error while processing system messages.

auth.accountCreated: Your account has been created. You can log in now.
auth.userCreationFailed: Uuups! Something went wrong while creating your user. Please try again later.
auth.sessionExpiredMessage: Your session has expired for security reasons. Please log in again to continue.
auth.createUserTitle: Want to create a user? It's that easy.
auth.createUserMessage:
Just choose a PIN - no username and no password required.

Please keep this PIN safe. We do not store it, cannot reset it, and cannot recover it for you.

If the PIN is lost, access to this user is permanently lost as well.

You can delete your user at any time in the app.

If the user is not used for 90 days, it will be automatically and permanently deleted, including all associated data.
auth.pinIncorrect: PIN is not correct. Please try again.
auth.userNotFoundMessage:
Looks like this user has been inactive for a while.

To keep things clean and simple, users are automatically deleted after 90 days of inactivity.

You can create a new one anytime - no signup, no hassle.
auth.backendErrorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

pm10.low: Low PM10 level. Air quality is good.
pm10.high: High PM10 level. Consider limiting outdoor activity.

pm2_5.low: Low PM2.5 level. Air is clean.
pm2_5.veryHigh: Very high PM2.5. Unhealthy air quality.

pollutants.carbonMonoxide: Carbon monoxide (CO) - a colorless, odorless gas harmful in high concentrations.
pollutants.nitrogenDioxide: Nitrogen dioxide (NO2) - a pollutant from traffic and combustion.
pollutants.sulphurDioxide: Sulphur dioxide (SO2) - can irritate airways and affect lung function.
pollutants.ozone: Ozone (O3) - high levels can lead to respiratory problems.

tooltips.alderPollen: Alder pollen can cause allergic reactions like sneezing or itchy eyes.
tooltips.birchPollen: Birch pollen is a common allergen, especially in spring.
tooltips.grassPollen: Grass pollen is a major cause of hay fever during the summer months.
tooltips.mugwortPollen: Mugwort pollen is active late summer and may trigger asthma.
tooltips.olivePollen: Olive pollen is common in Mediterranean areas.
tooltips.ragweedPollen: Ragweed pollen is highly allergenic and spreads easily.
tooltips.pm10: PM10 refers to coarse particles that can enter the lungs and cause respiratory issues.
tooltips.pm2_5: PM2.5 are fine particles that penetrate deep into the lungs and bloodstream.
tooltips.carbonMonoxide: CO is a toxic gas that can impair oxygen transport in the body.
tooltips.nitrogenDioxide: NO2 is produced by traffic emissions and affects lung function.
tooltips.sulphurDioxide: SO2 can cause respiratory symptoms and aggravate asthma.
tooltips.ozone: O3 is a reactive gas that can cause airway inflammation and breathing issues.
